text: is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Takayuki Mizushina. It tells the story of Muco, the Shiba Inu of glassblower Komatsu-san. ==Manga== Mizushina first published Lovely Muco in Evening, a magazine by Kodansha. Two years later, Japanese bookstore workers voted it the sixth in the list of most recommended manga. As of 2017 eleven volumes have been published in Japanese, ten in English. ==Anime== In 2013 and 2014, a short anime based on the manga by Doga Kobo was used as interstitials on the Fuji TV programme Non-Stop!. A separate anime series started airing on October 3, 2015. ==Characters== ; : The shiba-inu pet of Komatsu. ; : Main character, a glassblower. ; : A bar patron and friend of Komatsu. ; : A local barkeep. ; : Bouda's daughter. ; : Love interest. ; : ; : ==References== ==External links== * KODANSHA ComicPlus Itoshino MUCO * TAKAYUKI MIZUSHINA Web・SINAMISM・ - （Official website） * * Lovely Muuuuuuuco! - Fuji Television On Demand * TV animation Itoshino MUCO Official website Category:2011 manga Category:Seinen manga Category:Kodansha manga Category:Fuji TV original programming Category:TV Tokyo original programming
title: Lovely Muco
